Text: Just wanted to say thanks for posting a nice complete collection.  I've recently gotten back into Mame and had lost my collection a couple years back in a hdd crash. :/   Was curious if you have or are planning to post CHDs for Mame 0.149?   Thanks again man. :)
derceto i no have plan to go chds roms all chds complete 0.149 is 250gb very big
